Our organization has been trying to supply an answer to the international
news credibility gap by making available to domestic stations the
English language news and commentary broadcasts originating in the
short-wave services of foreign countries. j

In the domestic broadcasting systems, the non-network, small usually
daytime only stations most often in sub-urban areas and the educational
stations in khe metropolitan areas or "college towns" are most
